sentences: Scott Amendola (born February 6, 1969) is an American drummer from the San Francisco Bay Area.
Amendola is originally from New Jersey and studied at the Berklee School of Music in Boston.
After relocating to California, he rose to popularity in the 1990s as a member of the band T.J. Kirk with Charlie Hunter, Will Bernard, and John Schott.
In 2011, Amendola premiered his orchestral work Fade to Orange, performed in conjunction with the Oakland East Bay Symphony as one of their New Visions/New Vistas premieres.

Greatest Hits (2016)With Invisible Bird – Dave Devine, Shane Endsley, Scott Amendola
